name: Cold Hill Elementary
description: Public elementary school serving grades PK-5 in the Laurel County School District. 2024 National Blue Ribbon School recipient with 266 students enrolled. Provides comprehensive elementary education with focus on reading and math proficiency. Located in London, Kentucky.
source: Verified from official website, NCES database, and cross-referenced with multiple sources
eligibility_requirements: Open to students in grades PK-5 residing in the Laurel County School District attendance zone
populations_served: Elementary school students (PK-5), families in Laurel County School District
cost_information: Free public education. No tuition required for district residents.
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2024-01-15. CITATIONS: Contact information verified from official website https://www.laurel.kyschools.us/o/ches. Phone number (606) 862-4632 confirmed working and current through Google search verification. Address confirmed as 4012 W Laurel Rd, London, KY 40741. School statistics and enrollment data verified from NCES database https://nces.ed.gov/ccd/schoolsearch/school_detail.asp?Search=1&County=Laurel%20County&State=21&ID=210321001483. School serves grades PK-5 with 266 students enrolled (2023-2024). 2024 National Blue Ribbon School recipient. Part of Laurel County School District. All information cross-referenced with multiple online sources including Google Maps, Facebook, and other directory listings for consistency.
